chart_description: This chart shows the disk read activity of various applications on the system in kilobits per second (KiB/s). The stacked chart type presents the individual contribution of each application to the overall disk read activity.

dimension_descriptions.containers: The amount of disk reads requested by applications running inside containers.
dimension_descriptions.go.d.plugin: The amount of disk reads performed by the go.d.plugin Netdata plugin.
dimension_descriptions.kube-proxy: The amount of disk reads requested by the Kubernetes proxy component.
dimension_descriptions.kubelet: The amount of disk reads requested by the Kubernetes node agent.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: The amount of disk reads performed by the Netdata monitoring agent itself.
dimension_descriptions.other: The amount of disk reads performed by other (non-categorized) processes or applications.
dimension_descriptions.sql: The amount of disk reads requested by SQL databases or applications.
dimension_descriptions.system: The amount of disk reads requested by the operating system processes.
dimension_descriptions.tc-qos-helper: The amount of disk reads performed by the Netdata tc-qos-helper component, which applies Quality of Service (QoS) to network traffic.
